lead: Big Tech's influence continues to reshape the political landscape as new tech innovations and partnerships emerge.

stories.title: One year in, Big Tech has out-maneuvered MAGA populists
stories.summary: As the first anniversary of Trump's presidency approaches, Big Tech leaders have strategically aligned themselves with the administration, influencing American politics significantly.

stories.title: Bolna nabs $6.3M from General Catalyst for its India-focused voice orchestration platform
stories.summary: Bolna has secured $6.3 million in funding to enhance its voice orchestration platform, focusing on the growing Indian market.

stories.title: Sony and TCL are teaming up to make your next TV, and it's a bigger deal than you think
stories.summary: Sony and TCL have announced a partnership that will see TCL take control of Sony's TV division by 2027, indicating a significant shift in the television market.

stories.title: Netflix to redesign its app as it competes with social platforms for daily engagement
stories.summary: In an effort to boost user engagement, Netflix plans to redesign its app to incorporate more social features, including vertical video feeds.

stories.title: Elon Musk Makes Part of X Algorithm Open Source, Says It ‘Sucks’
stories.summary: Elon Musk has made a portion of the X algorithm open source, openly criticizing its effectiveness and inviting community input for improvements.
